name: Tilde I-> Indent

sections.text:
~nI  is the same as (pprint-indent :block n).
~n:I is the same as (pprint-indent :current n).  In both cases, n defaults
to zero, if it is omitted.

~nI  is the same as (pprint-indent :block n).

~n:I is the same as (pprint-indent :current n).  In both cases, n defaults
to zero, if it is omitted.
